trans-unit.source: Provides extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) serialization services for an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> at design time.
trans-unit.target: 디자인 타임에 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />에 대한 XAML(extensible Application Markup Language) serialization 서비스를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer> provides methods that serialize activity class objects into XAML format and deserialize XAML content into activity class objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer>는 활동 클래스 개체를 XAML 형식으로 serialize하고 XAML 콘텐츠를 활동 클래스 개체로 deserialize하는 메서드를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: These services are primarily used by activity designers to persist the classes on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 서비스는 주로 활동 디자이너가 워크플로 디자인 화면의 클래스를 유지하는 데 사용됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about serialization, see [Serialization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d1111c0-9447-4231-a997-96a2b74b3453).
trans-unit.target: Serialization에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [Serialization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d1111c0-9447-4231-a997-96a2b74b3453)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer" /> class.
The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager" /> to use in this instance creation.
The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to create.
Creates an instance of the specified <see cref="T:System.Type" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Type" />를 사용하여 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager" />의 인스턴스를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the newly created <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
The index of the last character in the activity definition.
The index of the last line in the activity definition.
The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager" /> that manages the serialization process.
The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that was serialized.
Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer" /> that an object has just been serialized.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer.OnAfterSerialize%2A> is called immediately after the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A> method runs and performs post-serialization processing on `obj`, primarily formatting and indenting code and extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) in the .xoml file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer.OnAfterSerialize%2A>는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A> 메서드가 실행되고 `obj`에 대해 serialization 후 처리를 수행한 직후에 호출되어 주로 .xoml 파일의 코드 및 XAML(extensible Application Markup Language)의 형식을 지정하고 들여 씁니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager" /> that manages the serialization process.
The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to be serialized.
Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer" /> that an object is about to be serialized.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer.OnAfterSerialize%2A> is called immediately before the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A> method runs on the activity specified by `obj`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer.OnAfterSerialize%2A>는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A> 메서드가 `obj`에 지정된 활동에 대해 실행된 직후에 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer.OnBeforeSerialize%2A> writes the opening extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) tag for the activity, including any required attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer.OnBeforeSerialize%2A>는 필요한 모든 특성을 포함하여 활동에 대한 여는 XAML(extensible Application Markup Language) 태그를 씁니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="serializationManager" />, <paramref name="obj" />, or <paramref name="writer" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serializationManager" />, <paramref name="obj" /> 또는 <paramref name="writer" />에 null 참조(Visual Basic의 경우 <see langword="Nothing" />)가 포함된 경우

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="obj" /> is not of type <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
The index of the first character in the activity definition.
trans-unit.target: 활동 정의의 첫 번째 문자 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The index of the first line in the activity definition.
trans-unit.target: 활동 정의의 첫 번째 줄 인덱스입니다.
